## isUpperCase() function

are a strings \[a-z\] letters all upper case?

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function isUpperCase(string: string): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  string | <code>string</code> | the string to check |

<b>Returns:</b>

`boolean`

true if all \[a-z\] characters in the string are upper case
